abilities.title: Teleportation
abilities.description: Can instantly move between locations within the Whispering Woods.

abilities.title: Illusion Weaving
abilities.description: Creates convincing illusions to confuse and mislead.

encounters.outcome: The elves were tricked by an illusion and lost their way.
The hermit claimed to have received a cryptic message from the Aetherwalker.

relatedLegends.title: The Lost Treasure of the Woods
